Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/United States. President (1945-1953 : Truman)
description: A brief biography starts the story of President Truman as he is sworn in as President in 1945 and carries it through his eight eventful years in the White House; the final stages of World War II in Europe and Asia, domestic developments and the Truman doctrine.
